short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cruxify your documents or Take notes.
Just Read. Copy. Download.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate a crux for documents, articles or blogposts you read online. 
Just keep copying what you feel is important.
Cruxify automatically adds this text to your crux or summary.
Access and Edit the crux from the Cruxify popup.
Finally download the crux as a text file for future reference.

It's that simple!

Note-taking:
You may alternatively use the Edit feature to take notes in the browser itself. This is especially very useful for those who take online classes or watch video tutorials online. With this, you need not pause the video and switch apps to take digital notes. Just open the popup while watching the lecture and start typing!

Now, mix these two features and unlock new productivity levels by using these generic features as suited for your needs.

Please email me at asingla590@gmail.com for any bug that you discover, or if you have any feature request or suggestions.
